title: WTTF/WTB Walter Johnson T206 Portrait pr-fr scans on trade bait included
author: frankh8147

posts.post_title: WTTF/WTB Walter Johnson T206 Portrait pr-fr scans on trade bait included
posts.post_content: My ideal outcome would be a part cash-part trade deal but i would also happily trade in your favor or buy it outright if the price is right. Graded or ungraded. Let me know what you have, or if you have any questions about condition and hopefully we can work something out. Scans are below,thanks!
